subject: never arrived
description_text:
order SSN1770 was placed 3 weeks ago and still hasn’t arrived. If it’s not here by this week on friday i will dispute the charge, just letting you know.

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for iOS

conversations.body_text: Hi Roniportillo232,     Your package delivery failed because the street address was incorrect and the customer could not be reached. Please confirm your address information:   roni portillo   1177 south second street   plainfield NJ 07060  +1 908-548-6501   You can contact this number to arrange for redelivery: +1(800)742-5877   Your logistics tracking number: 1ZX6190C0304902930  ​​
